description: LUCKNOW: The students of Lucknow University staged a protest against the killing of Vivek Tiwari by covering their mouth with black bands.
title: Lucknow University students stage protest at Vivek Tiwari's residence with family
title_page: Lucknow University students stage protest at Vivek Tiwari's residence with family | Lucknow News - Times of India
text: LUCKNOW: The students of Lucknow University staged a protest against the killing of Vivek Tiwari by covering their mouth with black bands.When TOI asked the students about their protest, they said that there is no freedom of expression in owing to which they have covered their mouth with black bands."So many fake encounters are happening in Uttar Pradesh villages which never come to light. Now, police have started murdering people in the city also," said Anil Master, a PhD student.Another student Madhuriya Singh said that they will sit in the apartment till all the demands of the family are fulfilled. "We want resignation of UP CM Yogi Adityanath ," added Singh.The students and residents of the apartment staged a candle march to protest against the poor law and order situation in the state capital and raised slogans against CM Yogi and UP Police."The government has given a free hand to police owing to which they feel that they can get away with anything," said Mahendra Yadav, a student.
